summary.span: 一个抽象类，可以实现此类以便对安全状态进行编码。

span.span: An abstract class that can be implemented to encode the security state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在使用具有消息安全（该消息安全使用有状态安全上下文令牌）的绑定时，此类用于编码和解码该安全上下文令牌的内容。This class is used to encode and decode the content of the security context token when a binding with message security that uses a stateful security context token is used. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 有状态安全上下文令牌，请参阅[如何： 为安全会话创建安全上下文令牌](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-security-context-token-for-a-secure-session.md)主题。 stateful security context tokens, see [How to: Create a Security Context Token for a Secure Session](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-security-context-token-for-a-secure-session.md) topic. 的 Microsoft 版本为 。Microsoft’s version of is . 它使用 Microsoft 的[Windows 数据保护 (DPAPI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96704)技术用于加密/解密 cookie。It uses Microsoft’s [Windows Data Protection (DPAPI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96704) technology to encrypt/decrypt the cookie. 通过实现此类，您可以为加密和解密 Cookie 插入一种不同的机制。You can plug in a different mechanism for encrypting and decrypting cookies by implementing this class. 安全状态的编码必须确保已对服务的状态进行了签名和加密。The encoding of the security state must ensure that the state is signed and encrypted for the service. 将已颁发的 `SecurityContextToken` 作为 Cookie 的安全状态发送到客户端时，此类由服务器使用。This class is used by the server when sending the security state as a cookie in the `SecurityContextToken` issued to the client. `X509CertificateSecurityStateEncoder` 是实现此类的一个示例，它使用服务的证书来签名和加密安全状态。An example implementation of this class is an `X509CertificateSecurityStateEncoder` that uses the service's certificate to sign and encrypt the security state.
